ssot__ConversationReasonCategory__dlm.name: Conversation Reason Category
ssot__ConversationReasonCategory__dlm.description: The Conversation Reason Category DMO represents a grouping of conversation reasons that have the same overall topic. It contains aggregated metrics for the associated conversation reasons, such as order management, payments, and account management.

ssot__AverageDurationSecondsNumber__c.description: The average duration for the conversation category in seconds.

ssot__AverageNumOfTurnsConversationNumbe.description: The average number of turns in the conversation category/

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the conversation reason category DMO.

ssot__ConvReasonReportDefinitionID__c.description: A reference ID to the conversation reason report definition.

ssot__DateSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by the external record ID.

ssot__DateSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__EinsteinScoreNumber__c.description: The Einstein score for the conversation reason category.

ssot__FrequencyPercent__c.description: The frequency percent for the conversation reason category.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the conversation reason category.

ssot__Name__c.description: The name of the conversation reason category.

ssot__ReasonCount__c.description: The count of conversation reasons in the category.

ssot__TotalConnversationCount__c.description: The count of conversations in the category.

ssot__TrainingDate__c.description: The date when the category report training last occurred.
